sense.name: an unintended consequence, an unforeseen result
sense.examples: The failed treaty will have grave repercussions for the entire region. The decline in real estate value is having repercussions in other parts of the economy as well.

sense.name: a physical rebound or recoil from an impact
sense.examples: We could hear the repercussions of thunder echoing through the canyons. The repercussion of the vehicle from the guardrail sent it careening across two lanes of traffic.
